title: Should We Pay Off the House? (Hour 1)
description:
Dave Ramsey & Dr. John Delony discuss:

Pulling from a retirement account to pay off a house,

Investing for the long term,

Replacing a vehicle,

Rolling over a pension into a 401(k),

How to use a $140k bonus,

How the fed keeps screwing up the economy.


Support Our Sponsor:

Zander Insurance

NetSuite

Carwiser
